name: Castle Story: Puzzle & Choice
description:
Help Alice the young lord renovate the castle with magic. Bring back her family's past glory and find hidden treasures! A touching legend awaits you to compose.

Decorate and renovate the castle by beating match-3 levels! Makeover each room with a large selection of classical furnitures and exquisite decorations, including your personal bathroom and garden.

Features:
● Help Alice cast magic spell by swapping and matching pieces!
● Renovate the castle and design the interior, keep your home under control.
● Fun and challenging match-3 levels with unique boosters and explosive combinations!
● Follow the storyline and discover all the hidden secrets in your castle!

If you enjoy match-3 puzzle games and home design, decor, renovate games, Castle Story is just the game for you! Join the millions who cast magic unrestrainedly and makeover your home and garden, there're many rooms waiting for your decoration and renovation.
